input.sentences: the river front view was simply mesmerizing .
the mother and son looked very happy as they posed for a picture .
the husband and wife decided they should take a picture together as well .
the [male] adams memorial is a really historic landmark | we had to capture it .
the city looked amazing on such a cold winter day .
output.sentences: We went to visit our son.  He lived beside the sea.
He took us sightseeing and my husband took a photo of me and my son.
My son then took a photo of my husband and I.
Afterwards my son showed us a local memorial site.
Then we wandered around the city taking in the sights.
